page.title: 01Abbeystead
page.content: This is part of the Parish of Over Wyresdale. It contains the small village of Abbeystead with its primary school, Home Fa rm, Estate Office and 2 or 3 residences. Other similar small groups of residences are found at Tarnbrook Lower Lee and at Marshaw. The area is designated as part of the Bowland area of outstanding natural beauty. The whole of the land is owned by the Grosvenor Estates. The main occupation is farming and estate workers viz gamekeepers, gardeners, woodmen. The farms are hill farms with a flock of heath going sheep In spite of extensive drainage in recent years the lands remains generally wet. This being due to a combination of high rainfall and the soil composition which is, in the main, peat on clay.
